attributes.action: Follow the freedom of infomation act and aquiesce to the many requests for the release of the draft of the WMD dossier whose existence is admitted by the Foreign Ofice and is allegedly written by John Williams, but which is still being withheld by the government. WHY?.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I truly believe there was something intinsincally shady about the lead up to the war in Iraq and I believe the release of this documnet might help to clarify matters
